attributes.action: urge The Speaker of The House of Commons Mr Michael Martin to resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker is bringing Parliament into disrepute by setting himself against public opinion and MPs in repeatedly refusing to accept that MP's expenses are of legitimate interest to the public and need transparency and reform, and his failing to allow MPs to express their views on this topic.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
